groups.name: outbox.retry.jittered
groups.description: Jittered retry policy configuration with configurable base policy

groups.name: outbox.instance
groups.description: Outbox instance management and coordination configuration

properties.name: outbox.poll-interval
properties.description: Interval in milliseconds at which the outbox is polled

properties.name: outbox.batch-size
properties.description: Maximum number of aggregate IDs to process in a single batch

properties.name: outbox.retry.max-retries
properties.description: Maximum number of retry attempts for failed outbox events

properties.name: outbox.retry.exponential.initial-delay
properties.description: Initial delay in milliseconds for exponential backoff retry policy

properties.name: outbox.retry.exponential.max-delay
properties.description: Maximum delay in milliseconds for exponential backoff retry policy

properties.name: outbox.retry.exponential.multiplier
properties.description: Multiplier for exponential backoff. Each retry delay is multiplied by this factor.

properties.name: outbox.retry.fixed.delay
properties.description: Fixed delay in milliseconds between retry attempts for fixed delay retry policy

properties.name: outbox.retry.jittered.base-policy
properties.description: Base retry policy for jittered retry. Options: 'fixed', 'exponential'

properties.name: outbox.retry.jittered.jitter
properties.description: Maximum random jitter in milliseconds to add to the base policy's delay

properties.name: outbox.processing.stop-on-first-failure
properties.description: Whether to stop processing remaining events in an aggregate when one event fails. If true (default), processing stops on first failure to maintain strict ordering. If false, continues processing other events allowing failed events to be retried later.

properties.name: outbox.instance.graceful-shutdown-timeout-seconds
properties.description: Timeout in seconds for graceful shutdown of outbox processing instances

properties.name: outbox.instance.stale-instance-timeout-seconds
properties.description: Timeout in seconds to consider an instance stale and remove it from active instances

properties.name: outbox.instance.heartbeat-interval-seconds
properties.description: Interval in seconds between instance heartbeats to indicate the instance is still active

properties.name: outbox.instance.new-instance-detection-interval-seconds
properties.description: Interval in seconds for detecting new instances that have joined the cluster
